author: AceHack

comments.author: AceHack
comments.body:
This appears to be a similar issue.

http://web.archive.org/web/20130608164153/http://connect.microsoft.com/PowerShell/feedback/details/315875/unable-to-capture-all-session-output-into-a-transcript
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13160759/start-transcript-not-capturing-all-output-to-log-file

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Do you get a _random_ output in transcript file run by run?

comments.author: AceHack
comments.body: Well the output is not random really, it's either the results from the exe commands or not.  What is random is if the results show up in the logs or not.

title: Start-Transcript sporadically loses exe output
